TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamInstance extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

summary.span: 類別表示 AD LDS 執行個體伺服器。

span.span: The class represents an AD LDS instance server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 類別是指到 Active Directory 應用程式模式 (ADAM) 其中已重新命名為 Active Directory 輕量型目錄服務 (AD LDS)。The class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

span.span: Demand value:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

summary.span: 叫用知識一致性檢查程式 (KCC)，以驗證此 AD LDS 執行個體的複寫拓撲。

span.span: Invokes the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) that verifies the replication topology for this AD LDS instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱主題"DsReplicaConsistencyCheck"在 MSDN Library 中[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。For more information, see the topic "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

exception.span: 呼叫基礎目錄服務導致發生錯誤。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: 目標伺服器忙碌或無法使用。

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The object has been disposed.

exception.span: 指定的帳戶沒有執行這項作業的權限。

span.span: The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 AD LDS 執行個體所服務的預設磁碟分割。

value.span: 如果未設定預設磁碟分割，則會傳回 。

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

span.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

exception.span: 磁碟分割名稱不是有效的辨別名稱格式，或是 AD LDS 執行個體不會服務此磁碟分割；

span.span: The partition name is not in a valid distinguished name format, or the AD LDS instance does not serve this partition.
Applies to set only.
The object has been disposed.
